children.name: Dr. Emily Harris
children.link: Goal: To make extra income by diagnosing false injuries. Backstory: Once a respected physician, faced financial ruin and turned to insurance fraud.

children.name: James Clarkson
children.link: Goal: To gain financially by filing fraudulent claims. Backstory: An ambitious lawyer with a declining career, saw opportunity in insurance fraud.

children.name: Mia Thompson
children.link: Goal: To boost business revenue by misrepresenting vehicle damages. Backstory: Inherited a struggling body shop and resorted to fraud to save it.

children.name: Alex Martinez
children.link: Goal: To make quick money by pretending to be involved in accidents. Backstory: Part-time student with debt, lured into the fraud for financial relief.

children.name: Rachel Young
children.link: Goal: To support her family financially through fraud. Backstory: A single mother, joined the fraud ring out of desperation to provide for her children.

children.name: Ethan Smith
children.link: Goal: To earn money for his startup by faking injuries. Backstory: Aspiring entrepreneur needing funds, saw the fraud as a temporary solution.

children.name: Olivia Brown
children.link: Goal: To fund her travels through participation in the fraud scheme. Backstory: Travel enthusiast lacking funds, joined the fraud ring for financial gain.
